name: NFBL-NATIONAL FANTASY BASKETBALL LEAGUE
description:
NFBL(National Fantasy Basketball League) is a mini-stylish fantasy basketball management and strategy game where teams are created from scratch every season, and that allows you to create your dream squad with the budget given to you and compete in the Fantasy league.

Build your team with a starting budget, reinforce your squad with the successes you have achieved in the league, dominate your opponents with the tactics you will apply during the match and BE READY FOR THE PLAYOFFS!

Embark on different adventures in a different league each time you play with 1000s of different combinations of over 200 players.
